description:
A flashback sheds light on how Sanji came to join the crew, and Chopper`s backstory is revealed through memories of a visit to a snow-covered island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les séparations forgent un homme ! Sanji et Chopper
Parting Builds a Man`s Character! Sanji and Chopper
Wakare ga Otoko o Migaku! Sanji to Chopper
Разлука закаляет мужчин! Санджи и Чоппер
يقوّي الفراق شخصيّة الرّجل! سانجي وتشوبّر!
別れが男を磨く! サンジとチョッパー
